title: Circus Maximus Mithraeum
description: A mithraeum adjacent to the Circus Maximus and facing the carceres of the same was located at the margin of the Forum Boarium and now situated beneath a building in the via dell'Ara Massima. The site was excavated in 1931.

properties.description: Coordinates following GeoHack - Mitreo del Circo Massimo
properties.title: Imagery location of Mitreo del Circo Massimo
